channel.title: Gluon Weapon, infinite flashlight mode
channel.description:
The bug causes the player to fire the Gluon Beam without using any ammo. It doesn't deal any damage at all, but it spawns decals and light.
How to reproduce:
1. Get gluon gun, 2. Hold fire1, 3. Press 'Z' to zoom, 4. Release fire1
Voilá, you now have a much better and cooler flashlight than the hev suit flashlight.
Can be done without wasting any ammo at all if you're quick enough. [img]https://i.imgur.com/NhahxNJ.jpg[/img]
